sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import Blockies from 'react-blockies'; import { Timeline, Typography } from 'antd'; import { SendOutlined, DownloadOutlined, EditOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; const { Text } = Typography; export default function TimelineDisplay(props) { return ( Clone and Install from the github repo Start your frontend app with: yarn start Start your local blockchain with: yarn run chain (and refresh) Compile and deploy your smart contract: yarn run deploy Fix error in SmartContractWallet.sol then: yarn run deploy } color={props.hasEther?"green":"blue"}> Send test ether to your address using (bottom left) faucet } color={props.contractHasEther?"green":"blue"}> Deposit some funds into your smart contract wallet } color={props.amOwnerOfContract?"green":"blue"}> Set owner of your smart contract wallet to your address Yikes, anyone can take ownership of SmartContractWallet.sol Test your contract with buidler/test/myTest.js then: yarn run test Build something awesome with üèó scaffold-eth and @ me! Read more about Ethereum, Solidity, and Buidler ); }
